## FirebaseAppInternals.getToken() method

Gets an auth token for the associated app.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getToken(forceRefresh?: boolean): Promise<FirebaseAccessToken>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  forceRefresh | boolean | Whether or not to force a token refresh.  {<!-- -->Promise<FirebaseAccessToken>} A Promise that will be fulfilled with the current or new token. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[FirebaseAccessToken](./firebase-admin.firebaseaccesstoken.md)<!-- -->&gt;
